personaName.description: Name of the review role performing the review (security-engineer, code-quality-engineer, sre-engineer, frontend-ux-engineer)

riskFindings.description: List of identified risks and issues

category.description: Category of the risk (e.g., security, performance, accessibility)

description.description: Detailed description of the risk or issue

location.description: File path and line number or component where the issue was found

impact.description: Potential impact if the issue is not addressed

requiredEnhancements.description: List of required improvements or enhancements

type.description: Type of enhancement (e.g., validation, testing, refactoring)

description.description: Detailed description of the required enhancement

priority.description: Priority level for implementing the enhancement

suggestedApproach.description: Recommended approach or solution for the enhancement

affectedFiles.description: List of files that need to be modified

summary.description: High-level summary of the review findings

highIssueCount.description: Number of high severity issues found

mediumIssueCount.description: Number of medium severity issues found

lowIssueCount.description: Number of low severity issues found

positiveFindings.description: List of positive aspects or best practices observed
